import { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Auth.css"; const Auth = () => { const [isSignup, setIsSignup] = useState(false); const [role, setRole] = useState("lecturer"); // الحالة الافتراضية: محاضر return (
{/* الكرت اليسار */}

)}

Don’t have an account? setIsSignup(true)}> Create account

); }; export default Auth;
